message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $105?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to consider $100. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $110, but I think I can do better than that. How about we meet at $110.50?
